column2: dir = ifelse(log2FoldChange < 0, "Down", "Up"), #If log2FoldChange is less than 0, the dir column for that gene will be assigned the string "Down" (indicating downregulation).
sig = ifelse(padj <= 0.05 & abs(log2FoldChange) > log2(1.2), TRUE, FALSE)

) #The adjusted p-value. / This means the gene's expression must have changed by at least a 1.2-fold increase (e.g., from 10 to 12) or a 1.2-fold decrease (e.g., from 10 to 10/1.2 â‰ˆ 8.33) to be considered biologically meaningful enough by this threshold.
